title: Autism Screening Questionnaire
instructions: For each statement, please rate on a scale from 1 (Strongly Disagree) to 10 (Strongly Agree). This questionnaire is for self-assessment purposes only and is not a diagnostic tool.

questions.text: I find it difficult to start or maintain a conversation with others.
I often struggle to understand or respond to other people's emotions.
I have difficulty interpreting nonverbal cues, such as facial expressions and body language.
I prefer to follow a strict routine and find unexpected changes upsetting.
I am easily overwhelmed by bright lights, loud noises, or strong smells.
I tend to have very focused and intense interests in specific topics.
I feel more comfortable engaging in solitary activities than social gatherings.
I sometimes find it challenging to understand sarcasm or subtle humor.
I notice details in my environment that others might overlook.
I find it difficult to adapt quickly to new situations or environments.
I prefer clear, direct communication over indirect or abstract language.
I occasionally struggle with coordinating my movements or activities.
I sometimes feel overwhelmed by the emotional intensity of social situations.
I feel more comfortable when expectations and rules are explicitly stated.
I believe my way of thinking or processing information is different from most peopleâ€™s.
